name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (KeepCoding)
description:
Dungeon Escape is a fun speedrun game, the rules are simple : you have to complete 21 rooms , each room contain different obstacles and one key, get the key to unlock the room... oh and don't die.

CONTROLS:

Use LEFT and RIGHT arrows or "A D" to move.

SPACE or UP arrow to jump, press twice to double jump.

Press "P" to pause the game.

FOR BEST EXPERIENCE PLEASE USE THE FULL SCREEN BUTTON.
